sbd._note: Small Business Deduction: 9% federal rate on first $500,000 of active business income (indexed for 2025). Source: https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency/services/tax/businesses/topics/corporations/corporation-tax-rates.html

general._note: General corporate tax rate: 15% federal on income above SBD limit. Source: https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency/services/tax/businesses/topics/corporations/corporation-tax-rates.html

_note: 2025 federal corporate tax rates from official CRA source. Federal SBD limit is $500,000 for 2025.
